attributes.action: Show the true will of the people and leave the EU come what may on 22/5/2019
attributes.additional_details:
Extension or revocation of article 50 is illegal under UK and EU law.

The United Kingdom Voted to leave the European Union by a majority vote I’m which the prime minister at the time publicly announced that the government would deliver on the result of the EU referendum, this did not and has not happened. The government has ignored the democratic vote of the people and therefore have proven themselves to be untrustworthy and therefore we should deem them unfit to deliver on the the result
attributes.background:
Revocation of Article 50 is illegal.
Extension of Article 50 is illegal.
The UK voted by a majority to leave the EU.

The will of the people of the United Kingdom is being ignored

Enough is Enough

rejection.details:
We have received a large number of petitions in support of leaving the EU, which are very similar to petitions that are already open. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one asking for the same thing. You are more likely to get action if you sign and share a single petition. 

You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

Brexit article 50 must not be withdrawn https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246387

Leave the EU Without a deal on April 12th https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/248281 

Leave EU by April 12th 2019 with deal or no deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250967 

Leave with No Deal if Parliament rejects the EU Withdrawal Agreement https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234393

Renegotiate the Brexit deal immediately in the event MPs vote against it https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234195

Support the Prime Minister's Brexit Deal https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233104

Say no to another EU Referendum aka "Peoples Vote" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241418
